name: Camtasia Shortcut Set (macOS only)
summary: A CAMSC file contains a set of keyboard shortcuts used by the macOS version of TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing application. It stores a list of shortcuts and their associated actions in plain text. Camtasia users type shortcuts stored in a CAMSC file to more quickly perform actions, such as adding the last used transition or to start recording.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
